entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
